metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7952 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: X.org libXtst before 1.2.3 allows remote X servers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite loop) via a reply in the (1) XRecordStartOfData, (2)XRecordEndOfData, or (3) XRecordClientDied category without a clientsequence and with attached data.

criterions.comment: libxtst: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
